overview: Madeline, a seventy year-old woman explores memories of her life through an unreliable narration, where she describes how the reality of her life blended with fiction after she ate the pages of an entire novel in her childhood. She recalls meeting lovers from different eras of time, a possible miscarriage, adopting the ghost of a boy, and wonders how much of her memories are actual memories and how much are wishful reconstruction.
title: Madness of Madeline
